channel.title: 2h look?
channel.description: does any1 know the new 2h look in rs emote ids? :confused: or is it impossible to have? :(

item.title: 2h look?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

You’ll have to search for it yourself by testing. Or look at client hacking and look for some new animations, use that as an advantage for finding it

Read full topic

item.title: 2h look?
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:5, topic:193185”]That just makes it a two handed sword.
Not the stand gfx.[/quote]
I know…i said idk how to add real rs look but how to make it worn like a 2h…read before you flame.

Read full topic

item.title: 2h look?
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

[quote=“kaelen92, post:4, topic:193185”]well idk about making it look like the actualy rs animation but to make you weild it like a 2h regular. just open up item (the txt file) and you should see a bunch of confusing looking stuff, don’t pay attention to it. just look for the thing that says public static int twohanded[] = {11785,14860,10431,7158,1319,3202,6528}; that is what it will look like in item, just add the id in with the others in both files so if you wanted to add in item 14273(random number idk what item that is) it would look like this in item:

public static int twohanded[] = {14273,11785,14860,10431,7158,1319,3202,6528}; hope it helped
-Kaelen[/quote]
or u could make an add in client.java and just put

if(id == 4153 || id == 15334 || id == 15336 || id == 15335 || id == 15333) //gs { return 2065; }
in getstand -.-
i need emotes that are not old rs look

Read full topic

item.title: 2h look?
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

well idk about making it look like the actualy rs animation but to make you weild it like a 2h regular. just open up item (the txt file) and you should see a bunch of confusing looking stuff, don’t pay attention to it. just look for the thing that says public static int twohanded[] = {11785,14860,10431,7158,1319,3202,6528}; that is what it will look like in item, just add the id in with the others in both files so if you wanted to add in item 14273(random number idk what item that is) it would look like this in item:

public static int twohanded[] = {14273,11785,14860,10431,7158,1319,3202,6528}; hope it helped
-Kaelen

Read full topic
